metadata.name: Mega Satan Key Opens Everything
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod will give you a [u]permanent[/u] [b]Golden Key[/b] when you acquire the [b]Mega Satan Key[/b] (Key Piece 1 + Key Piece 2). Consequently, you will be able to open all doors, chests, locks, etc... without needing normal keys.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] [b]Repentance[/b] (tested). [b]Afterbirth+[/b] ([u]not[/u] tested but it should works).
